item.title: Kristen add a quote by Dali Lama
item.description: "World peace must develop from inner peace. Peace is not just mere absence of violence. Peace is, I think, the manifestation of human compassion." -- Dali Lama

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Baruch Spinoza
item.description: "Do not weep. Do not wax indignant. Understand." -- Baruch Spinoza

item.title: Kristen add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Failures are finger posts on the road to achievement." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "What difference does it make to the dead, the orphans and the homeless, whether the mad destruction is wrought under the name of totalitarianism or in the holy name of liberty or democracy?" -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Indira Gandhi National Centre f
item.description: "You cannot shake hands with a clenched fist." -- Indira Gandhi National Centre f

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Consistency is the hallmark of the unimaginative." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "All great things must first wear terrifying and monstrous masks, in order to inscribe themselves on the hearts of humanity." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Latin Expresssion
item.description: "Deus et natua non faciunt frusta" (God and nature do not work together in vain)" -- Latin Expresssion

item.title: Kristen add a quote by Latin Expression
item.description: "naturam expellas furca, tamen usque recurret. You can drive nature out with a pitchfork but she always comes back. Literally, "Nature can be expelled with a fork, but nevertheless always returns" -- Latin Expression
